mapper.insert: insert into recomment (num, userid, boardnum , content, regdate, ref, refstep, reflevel) values (#{num} , #{userid}, #{boardnum} , #{content}, #{regdate}, #{ref},#{refstep}, #{reflevel})
mapper.select: select count(*) from recomment where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.update: update recomment set content = #{content} where num = #{num}
